item.title: Lifecycle Versioning (v01, alpha)
item.description: The following document is versioned as alpha v1 by it’s own definition of such terms. If you are interested in contributing please either submit an issue to the repository for this blog or email me as detailed on the contact section of the about page. Introduction In the world of software projects, code lives a lifecycle. It is developed, released, packaged, used, and finally decommissioned1; often to be replaced by a successor from the same project.
